# Dobrocin, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Dobrocin}}

Dobrocin  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Małdyty, within Ostróda County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  east of Małdyty,  north of Ostróda, and  west of the regional capital Olsztyn.
